text:
Release date
November 2024
Question asked
Is it necessary to report radioactive waste from analytical devices and tracer applications?
ESRS Reference
ESRS E5 paragraph 39; ESRS 1 paragraph 34, ESRS 2 paragraph 56
Key terms
Waste; radioactive waste; datapoint, non-material
Background
The submitter provided the following background: â€˜Reporting all radioactive waste according to
2022/70/Euratom would include radioactive tracers and analytical devices and sensors. Reporting
